entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning except minus 14 in Whale Cove. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning except minus 14 in Whale Cove. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:22 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
